name: CUSTOM Shoppable videos
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy

  assign videos_position = section.settings.videos_position
  
  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile

  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile
  assign slider_view = section.settings.slider_view
  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile  
  assign slider_mt = section.settings.slider_mt
  assign slider_mt_mobile = section.settings.slider_mt_mobile

  assign video_radius = section.settings.video_radius
  assign video_ratio = section.settings.video_ratio
  assign video_ratio_mobile = section.settings.video_ratio_mobile
  
  assign player_size = section.settings.player_size
  assign player_size_mobile = section.settings.player_size_mobile
  assign player_color = section.settings.player_color
  assign player_hover_color = section.settings.player_hover_color

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color
  assign title_align = section.settings.title_align
  assign title_align_mobile = section.settings.title_align_mobile
  assign title_mt = section.settings.title_mt
  assign title_mt_mobile = section.settings.title_mt_mobile

  assign modal_overlay_color = section.settings.modal_overlay_color

  assign modal_button_bg_color = section.settings.modal_button_bg_color
  assign modal_button_bg_color_hover = section.settings.modal_button_bg_color_hover
  assign modal_button_size = section.settings.modal_button_size
  assign modal_button_size_mobile = section.settings.modal_button_size_mobile
  assign modal_button_icon_color = section.settings.modal_button_icon_color
  assign modal_button_icon_hover_color = section.settings.modal_button_icon_hover_color
  assign modal_button_radius = section.settings.modal_button_radius

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect

  assign thumbs_radius = section.settings.thumbs_radius
  assign thumbs_active_border_color = section.settings.thumbs_active_border_color

  assign modal_sidebar_padding_horizontal = section.settings.modal_sidebar_padding_horizontal
  assign modal_sidebar_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.modal_sidebar_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign modal_sidebar_padding_vertical = section.settings.modal_sidebar_padding_vertical
  assign modal_sidebar_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.modal_sidebar_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign modal_sidebar_bg_color = section.settings.modal_sidebar_bg_color
  assign modal_sidebar_back_color = section.settings.modal_sidebar_back_color

  assign modal_sidebar_heading = section.settings.modal_sidebar_heading
  assign modal_sidebar_back = section.settings.modal_sidebar_back
  assign modal_sidebar_heading_custom = section.settings.modal_sidebar_heading_custom
  assign modal_sidebar_heading_font = section.settings.modal_sidebar_heading_font
  assign modal_sidebar_heading_size = section.settings.modal_sidebar_heading_size
  assign modal_sidebar_heading_size_mobile = section.settings.modal_sidebar_heading_size_mobile
  assign modal_sidebar_heading_height = section.settings.modal_sidebar_heading_height
  assign modal_sidebar_heading_color = section.settings.modal_sidebar_heading_color
  assign modal_sidebar_heading_align = section.settings.modal_sidebar_heading_align
  assign modal_sidebar_heading_align_mobile = section.settings.modal_sidebar_heading_align_mobile

  assign list_gap = section.settings.list_gap
  assign list_gap_mobile = section.settings.list_gap_mobile
  assign list_mt = section.settings.list_mt
  assign list_mt_mobile = section.settings.list_mt_mobile

  assign product_image_radius = section.settings.product_image_radius
  assign product_image_ratio = section.settings.product_image_ratio
  assign product_image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.product_image_ratio_mobile

  assign product_content_align_mobile = section.settings.product_content_align_mobile
  assign product_content_align = section.settings.product_content_align

  assign product_content_horizontal_align = ""
  if product_content_align == "center"
    assign product_content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif product_content_align == "right"
    assign product_content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign product_content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign product_content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if product_content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign product_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif product_content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign product_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign product_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign product_title_custom = section.settings.product_title_custom
  assign product_title_font = section.settings.product_title_font
  assign product_title_size = section.settings.product_title_size
  assign product_title_size_mobile = section.settings.product_title_size_mobile
  assign product_title_height = section.settings.product_title_height
  assign product_title_color = section.settings.product_title_color
  assign product_title_mt = section.settings.product_title_mt
  assign product_title_mt_mobile = section.settings.product_title_mt_mobile

  assign product_price_custom = section.settings.product_price_custom
  assign product_price_font = section.settings.product_price_font
  assign product_price_size = section.settings.product_price_size
  assign product_price_size_mobile = section.settings.product_price_size_mobile
  assign product_price_height = section.settings.product_price_height
  assign product_price_color = section.settings.product_price_color
  assign product_price_original_color = section.settings.product_price_original_color
  assign product_price_mt = section.settings.product_price_mt
  assign product_price_mt_mobile = section.settings.product_price_mt_mobile

  assign button = section.settings.button
  assign button_sold = section.settings.button_sold
  assign button_add = section.settings.button_add
  assign button_size = section.settings.button_size
  assign button_size_mobile = section.settings.button_size_mobile
  assign button_color = section.settings.button_color
  assign button_hover_color = section.settings.button_hover_color
  assign button_custom = section.settings.button_custom
  assign button_font = section.settings.button_font
  assign button_height = section.settings.button_height
  assign button_padding_vertical = section.settings.button_padding_vertical
  assign button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal
  assign button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign button_radius = section.settings.button_radius
  assign button_border_thickness = section.settings.button_border_thickness
  assign button_border_color = section.settings.button_border_color
  assign button_border_hover_color = section.settings.button_border_hover_color
  assign button_bg_color = section.settings.button_bg_color
  assign button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.button_bg_hover_color
  assign button_style = section.settings.button_style
  assign button_mt = section.settings.button_mt
  assign button_mt_mobile = section.settings.button_mt_mobile

  assign product_stock = section.settings.product_stock
  assign product_out_stock = section.settings.product_out_stock
  assign product_stock_custom = section.settings.product_stock_custom
  assign product_stock_font = section.settings.product_stock_font
  assign product_stock_size = section.settings.product_stock_size
  assign product_stock_size_mobile = section.settings.product_stock_size_mobile
  assign product_stock_height = section.settings.product_stock_height
  assign product_stock_color = section.settings.product_stock_color
  assign product_out_stock_color = section.settings.product_out_stock_color

  assign quantity_custom = section.settings.quantity_custom
  assign quantity_font = section.settings.quantity_font
  assign quantity_size = section.settings.quantity_size
  assign quantity_size_mobile = section.settings.quantity_size_mobile
  assign quantity_height = section.settings.quantity_height
  assign quantity_color = section.settings.quantity_color
  assign quantity_border_color = section.settings.quantity_border_color
  assign quantity_border_thickness = section.settings.quantity_border_thickness 
  assign quantity_radius = section.settings.quantity_radius
  assign quantity_mt_mobile = section.settings.quantity_mt_mobile
  assign quantity_mt = section.settings.quantity_mt

  assign use_selector = section.settings.use_selector
  assign selector_custom = section.settings.selector_custom
  assign selector_font = section.settings.selector_font
  assign selector_size = section.settings.selector_size
  assign selector_size_mobile = section.settings.selector_size_mobile
  assign selector_height = section.settings.selector_height
  assign selector_color = section.settings.selector_color
  assign selector_mt = section.settings.selector_mt
  assign selector_mt_mobile = section.settings.selector_mt_mobile
  assign selector_icon_color = section.settings.selector_icon_color
  assign selector_border_thickness = section.settings.selector_border_thickness
  assign selector_border_color = section.settings.selector_border_color
  assign selector_bg_color = section.settings.selector_bg_color
  assign selector_radius = section.settings.selector_radius
  assign selector_padding_horizontal = section.settings.selector_padding_horizontal
  assign selector_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.selector_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign selector_padding_vertical = section.settings.selector_padding_vertical
  assign selector_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.selector_padding_vertical_mobile

  assign products_toggle = section.settings.products_toggle
  assign products_toggle_custom = section.settings.products_toggle_custom
  assign products_toggle_font = section.settings.products_toggle_font
  assign products_toggle_size = section.settings.products_toggle_size
  assign products_toggle_height = section.settings.products_toggle_height
  assign products_toggle_color = section.settings.products_toggle_color
  assign products_toggle_bg_color = section.settings.products_toggle_bg_color
  assign products_toggle_border_color = section.settings.products_toggle_border_color
  assign products_toggle_border_thickness = section.settings.products_toggle_border_thickness 
  assign products_toggle_radius = section.settings.products_toggle_radius

-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}  
  {{ title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ modal_sidebar_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ product_title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ product_price_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ product_stock_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ quantity_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  selector_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ products_toggle_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px !important;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px !important;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    position: relative;
  }

  .shoppable-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .shoppable-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .shoppable-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ slider_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .shoppable-video-{{ section.id }} {    
    text-decoration: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    width: 100%;    
  }

  .shoppable-video-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    overflow: hidden;
    border-radius: {{ video_radius }}px;
    position: relative;
  }

  .shoppable-video-{{ section.id }} video,
  .shoppable-video-{{ section.id }} iframe {
    position: relative;
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    margin: 0;
    border: 0;
    box-shadow: 0;
  }

  .shoppable-player-{{ section.id }} {
    width: {{ player_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ player_size_mobile }}px;
    background-color: transparent;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    z-index: 2;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    border: none;  
    cursor: pointer;
    padding: 0px;
  }

  .shoppable-player-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ player_color |  hex_to_rgba: 0.5 }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-video-{{ section.id }}:hover .shoppable-player-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ player_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-product-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ title_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ title_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    width: 100vw;
    height: 100vh;
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 0; 
    right: 0; 
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between; 
    background: {{ modal_overlay_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.8}};
    opacity: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    pointer-events: none;
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-{{ section.id }}.active {
    opacity: 1;
    z-index: 100;
    pointer-events: all;
    transition: all 250ms ease-in 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-close-modal-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    width: {{ modal_button_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ modal_button_size_mobile }}px;
    position: fixed;
    top: 12px;
    left: 12px;
    box-shadow: none;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px;
    cursor: pointer;
    z-index: 2;
    border-radius: {{ modal_button_radius }}px;
    padding: 6px;
    background-color: {{ modal_button_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.3 }};
  }

  .shoppable-close-modal-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    background-color: {{ modal_button_bg_color_hover | hex_to_rgba: 0.2 }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-close-modal-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: {{ modal_button_size_mobile | times: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .shoppable-close-modal-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ modal_button_icon_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-close-modal-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ modal_button_icon_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    position: relative;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-slider-{{ section.id }} {    
    max-height: 100vh;
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .shoppable-play-button-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    z-index: 3;
    display: none;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    width: {{ modal_button_size_mobile | times: 1.3 }}px;
    height: {{ modal_button_size_mobile | times: 1.3 }}px;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px;
    cursor: pointer;
    border-radius: {{ modal_button_radius }}px;
    padding: 6px;
    background-color: {{ modal_button_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.3 }};
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  .shoppable-play-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    background-color: {{ modal_button_bg_color_hover | hex_to_rgba: 0.2 }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-play-button-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: {{ modal_button_size_mobile | times: 0.5 }}px;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .shoppable-play-button-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ modal_button_icon_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-play-button-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ modal_button_icon_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-slide-{{ section.id }}.pause .shoppable-play-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-slide-{{ section.id }} video,
  .shoppable-modal-slide-{{ section.id }} iframe {
    display: block;
    object-fit: cover;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    border: 0px;
    box-shadow: none;
  }

  .shopppable-modal-thubmnail-body-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    left: 10px;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 15px;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-thumbnail-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    height: 300px;
    display: none !important;
  }

  .shoppable-thumbnail-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    cursor: pointer;
    border-radius: {{ thumbs_radius }}px;
  }

  .shoppable-thumbnail-slide-{{ section.id }} img,
  .shoppable-thumbnail-slide-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .shoppable-thumbnail-slide-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .shoppable-thumbnail-slide-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide-thumb-active {
    border: 2px solid {{ thumbs_active_border_color }};
  }

  .shoppable-sound-{{ section.id }} {
    width: {{ modal_button_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ modal_button_size_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ modal_button_radius }}px;
    background: {{ modal_button_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.3 }};
    display: flex !important;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    position: absolute;
    top: 12px;
    right: 12px;
    z-index: 3;
    padding: 6px;
  }

  .shoppable-sound-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background: {{ modal_button_bg_color_hover | hex_to_rgba: 0.2 }};
  }

  .shoppable-sound-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: {{ modal_button_size_mobile | times: 0.4 }}px;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .shoppable-sound-{{ section.id }} svg path:last-child {
    fill: {{ modal_button_icon_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-sound-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path:last-child {
    fill: {{ modal_button_icon_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-sound-{{ section.id }} .shoppable-unmute-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .shoppable-sound-{{ section.id }}.active .shoppable-unmute-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
  }

  .shoppable-sound-{{ section.id }}.active .shoppable-mute-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    transform: rotate(90deg);
  }

  .shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    transform: rotate(90deg);
  }

  .shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  
  .shoppable-modal-products-{{ section.id }} {
    background: {{ modal_sidebar_bg_color }};
    padding: {{ modal_sidebar_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ modal_sidebar_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    padding-bottom: 0px;
    height: 100vh;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 3;
    transform: translateX(100%);
    max-width: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-products-{{ section.id }}.mobile-active {
    transform: translateX(0%);
  }
  
  .shoppable-modal-product-text-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    width: 100%;
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-products-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ modal_sidebar_heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .shoppable-modal-products-heading-{{ section.id }} *,
  .shoppable-product-back-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ modal_sidebar_heading_size_mobile }}px;

    line-height: {{ modal_sidebar_heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 700;

  .shoppable-product-back-{{ section.id }} {
    cursor: pointer;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .shoppable-product-back-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 20px;
  }

  .shoppable-product-back-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    stroke: {{ modal_sidebar_back_color }};
  }

  .shoppable-products-list-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: {{ list_gap_mobile }}px;
    margin-top: {{ list_mt_mobile }}px;
    overflow-y: auto;
   height: calc(100% - {{ modal_sidebar_padding_vertical_mobile | times: 2 }}px);
    padding-bottom: {{ modal_sidebar_padding_vertical_mobile }}px;
    scrollbar-width: 0px;
  }

  .shoppable-products-list-{{ section.id }}::-webkit-scrollbar {
    display: none;
  }

  .shoppable-products-list-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: none;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-product-{{ section.id }} {
    max-width: calc(50% - {{ list_gap_mobile | times: 0.5 }}px);
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .shoppable-product-image-{{ section.id }} {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    width: 100%;
    overflow: hidden;
    border-radius: {{ product_image_radius }}px;
  }

  .shoppable-product-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .shoppable-product-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .shoppable-product-title-{{ section.id }},
  .shoppable-product-price-{{ section.id }},
  .shoppable-product-compare-price-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ product_content_align_mobile }};
  }

  .shoppable-product-title-{{ section.id }} {
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    white-space: nowrap;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .shoppable-product-title-{{ section.id }},
  .shoppable-product-form-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: {{ product_title_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ product_title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ product_title_color }};
    line-height: {{ product_title_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .shoppable-product-price-{{ section.id }},
  .shoppable-product-form-price-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    width: 100%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 5px;
    margin-top: {{ product_price_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ product_price_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ product_price_color }};
    line-height: {{ product_price_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .shoppable-product-form-price-{{ section.id }} {
    max-width: fit-content;
  }

  .shoppable-product-price-{{ section.id }} {
    justify-content: {{ product_content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }

  .shoppable-product-compare-price-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ product_price_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ product_price_original_color }};
    line-height: {{ product_price_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: line-through;
  }

  .shoppable-product-form-button-content-{{ section.id }} {
    flex: 1 1 auto;
  }

  .shoppable-product-button-{{ section.id }},
  .shoppable-product-form-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ button_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ button_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ button_color }};
    line-height: {{ button_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ button_radius }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background-color: transparent;
    border: 0px;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .shoppable-product-button-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  .shoppable-product-button-{{ section.id }}:hover,
  .shoppable-product-form-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    color: {{ button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-product-button-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
  }

  .shoppable-product-button-{{ section.id }} svg path,
  .shoppable-product-form-button-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ button_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-product-button-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path,
  .shoppable-product-form-button-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path{
    fill: {{ button_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-product-form-body-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100vh;
    max-height: 100%;
    display: block;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    background-color: {{ modal_sidebar_bg_color }};
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 101;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding: {{ modal_sidebar_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ modal_sidebar_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    margin-left: 100%;
    transition: margin-left .25s ease-out 0s;
  }

  .shoppable-product-form-body-{{ section.id }}.active {
    margin-left: 0;
    transition: margin-left .25s ease-out 0s;
    z-index: 999;
    pointer-events: all;
  }

  .shoppable-product-form-images-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-left: -{{ modal_sidebar_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px !important;
    margin-right: -{{ modal_sidebar_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px !important;
    padding-left:  {{ modal_sidebar_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px !important;
    padding-right: {{ modal_sidebar_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px !important;
  }

  .shoppable-product-form-image-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: 10px;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    overflow: hidden !important;
    border-radius: {{ product_image_radius }}px;
  }

  .shoppable-product-form-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .shoppable-product-form-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .shoppable-product-form-price-body-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin-top: {{ product_price_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .shoppable-product-form-stock-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ product_stock_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ product_stock_color }};
    line-height: {{ product_stock_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .shoppable-product-form-stock-{{ section.id }}.out {
    color: {{ product_out_stock_color }};
  }

  .shoppable-product-buy-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: stretch;
    gap: 10px;
    margin-top: {{ quantity_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .shoppable-product-buy-content-{{ section.id }} .shoppable-product-form-button-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
  }

  .shoppable-product-buy-content-{{ section.id }} .shoppable-product-form-button-{{ section.id }}[disabled] {
    opacity: 0.6;
  }

  .shoppable-product-quantity-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    width: 100px;
    max-width: 100px;
    padding: 11px;
    border: {{ quantity_border_thickness }}px solid {{ quantity_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ quantity_radius }}px;
  }

  .shoppable-product-quantity-wrapper-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 12px;
    height: 12px;
    object-fit: cover;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .shoppable-product-minus-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    stroke: {{ quantity_color }};
  }

  .shoppable-product-plus-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ quantity_color }};
  }

  .shoppable-product-count-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ quantity_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ quantity_color }};
    line-height: {{ quantity_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .shoppable-product-select-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    margin-top: {{ selector_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .shoppable-product-select-wrapper-{{ section.id }} > span {
    pointer-events: none;
    position: absolute;
    right: {{ selector_padding_horizontal_mobile | minus: 6 }}px;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    width: 25px;
    height: 100%;
  }

  .shoppable-product-select-wrapper-{{ section.id }} > span svg {
    stroke: unset;
    fill: {{ selector_icon_color }};
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }

  .shoppable-product-select-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    font-size: {{ selector_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ selector_height }}%;
    color: {{ selector_color }};
    position: relative;
    cursor: pointer;
    padding: {{ selector_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ selector_padding_horizontal_mobile | plus: 18 }}px {{ selector_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ selector_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    width: 100%;
    appearance: none;
    outline: none;
    box-shadow: none;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: {{ selector_border_thickness }}px solid {{ selector_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ selector_radius }}px;
    background: {{ selector_bg_color }};
  }

  .shoppable-modal-slide-toggle-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 40px;
    left: 10px;
    z-index: 2;
    cursor: pointer;
    padding: 6px 12px;
    border: {{ products_toggle_border_thickness }}px solid {{ products_toggle_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ products_toggle_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ products_toggle_bg_color }};
    font-size: {{ products_toggle_size }}px;
    color: {{ products_toggle_color }};
    line-height: {{ products_toggle_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-products-back-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    cursor: pointer;
    max-width: fit-content;
    position: absolute;
    top: 10px;
    left: 10px;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-products-back-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 18px;
  }

  .shoppable-modal-products-back-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    stroke: {{ modal_sidebar_back_color }};
  }

    }

    .shoppable-products-list-{{ section.id }} {

    }

    .shoppable-product-{{ section.id }} {
       max-width: calc(50% - {{ list_gap | times: 0.5 }}px);
    }

    .shoppable-product-button-{{ section.id }},
    .shoppable-product-form-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ button_mt }}px;

    .shoppable-product-title-{{ section.id }},

    .shoppable-product-title-{{ section.id }},

    }

    .shoppable-product-price-{{ section.id }},
    .shoppable-product-form-price-{{ section.id }} {

    }

    .shoppable-product-price-{{ section.id }} {

    }

    }

    .shoppable-product-form-images-{{ section.id }} {

      margin-right: -{{ modal_sidebar_padding_horizontal }}px !important;

      padding-right: {{ modal_sidebar_padding_horizontal }}px !important;
    }

    .shoppable-product-form-price-body-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ product_price_mt }}px;
    }

    .shoppable-product-form-stock-{{ section.id }} {
       font-size: {{ product_stock_size }}px;
    }

    .shoppable-product-form-body-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ modal_sidebar_padding_vertical }}px {{ modal_sidebar_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .shoppable-product-buy-content-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ quantity_mt }}px;
    }

    .shoppable-product-count-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ quantity_size }}px;
    }

    .shoppable-product-buy-content-{{ section.id }} .shoppable-product-form-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin: 0px;
    }

    .shoppable-product-select-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ selector_mt }}px;
    }

    .shoppable-product-select-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ selector_size }}px;
      padding: {{ selector_padding_vertical }}px {{ selector_padding_horizontal | plus: 18 }}px {{ selector_padding_vertical }}px {{ selector_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .shoppable-product-select-wrapper-{{ section.id }} > span {
      right: {{ selector_padding_horizontal | minus: 6 }}px;
    }

    .shoppable-modal-products-back-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }

    .shoppable-modal-slide-toggle-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }

    .shoppable-video-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if video_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .shoppable-video-inner-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/15;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif video_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .shoppable-video-inner-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif video_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .shoppable-video-inner-{{ section.id }}  {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .shoppable-video-inner-{{ section.id }}{
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9) rotate(90deg);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9) rotate(90deg);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if product_image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .shoppable-product-form-image-{{ section.id }},
    .shoppable-product-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/12;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif product_image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}

    .shoppable-product-form-image-{{ section.id }},
    .shoppable-product-image-{{ section.id }}{

    .shoppable-product-image-{{ section.id }} {

    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% elsif product_image_ratio == "landscape" %}

{% elsif product_image_ratio == "square" %}

<script>
  (function () {
    function moreLoadProductForm() {
      var productForm = document.querySelector('#custom-shoppable-videos');
      if (!productForm){
        var productForm = document.querySelector('{% if videos_position == "below_title" or videos_position == "above_title" %}.product__title{% elsif videos_position == "below_description" or videos_position == "above_description" %}.product__description{% elsif videos_position == "below_price" %}.price.price--large.price--show-badge{% else %}.button--add-to-cart, .product .product-form, .product-single__add-to-cart, .shopify-payment-button, .shopify-payment-button__button, .ProductForm__BuyButtons, .add-to-cart{% endif %}');
        if (!productForm) return;
        }
        const templateContent = document.querySelector(
          '#custom-shoppable-videos-{{ section.id }}'
        ).content;

        productForm.insertAdjacentElement(
          '{% if videos_position == "below_buy" or videos_position == "below_title" or videos_position == "below_description" or videos_position == "below_price" %}afterend{% else %}beforebegin{% endif %}',
          templateContent.firstElementChild
        );     
    }
    window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', moreLoadProductForm);
  })();
</script>

<template id="custom-shoppable-videos-{{ section.id }}">
  <div class="section-{{ section.id }} shoppable-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      {% if heading != blank %}
        <div class="shoppable-heading-{{ section.id }}">
          {{ heading }}
        </div>
      {% endif %}
      <div class="shoppable-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
        <div class="swiper-wrapper">
            {% for block in section.blocks %}
              <div class="shoppable-video-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide" id="{{ block.id }}">
                <div class="shoppable-video-inner-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% assign video_id = block.settings.video.id | default: block.settings.video_url.id %}
                  {% assign loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id %}
                  {%- if block.settings.video == null and block.settings.video_url != null -%}
                  {%- if block.settings.video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
                  <iframe
                    src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                    data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                    data-src2="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                    allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                    allowfullscreen
                    class="lazy"
                  ></iframe>
                  {%- else -%}
                  <iframe
                    data-src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                    data-src1="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                    data-src2="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                    allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                    allowfullscreen
                    class="lazy"
                  ></iframe>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% else %}
                    <video data-src="{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}" 
                        muted 
                        autoplay 
                        playsinline 
                        preload="none" 
                        loop 
                        class="lazy">
                      </video>
                  {% endif %}
                  <button class="shoppable-player-{{ section.id }}">
                    <svg viewBox="0 0 150 172" fill="none">
                      <path fill="#ffffff" fill-opacity="0.7" d="M37 129V43l75 43-75 43z"></path>
                    </svg>
                  </button>
                </div>
                {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                  <div class="shoppable-product-text-{{ section.id }}">
                    {{ block.settings.title }}
                  </div>
                {% endif %}
              </div>
            {% endfor %}
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<div class="shoppable-modal-{{ section.id }}">
  <button class="shoppable-close-modal-{{ section.id }}">
    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" version="1.1" width="512" height="512" x="0" y="0" viewBox="0 0 24 24" style="enable-background:new 0 0 512 512" xml:space="preserve"><g><path d="M23.707.293a1 1 0 0 0-1.414 0L12 10.586 1.707.293a1 1 0 0 0-1.414 0 1 1 0 0 0 0 1.414L10.586 12 .293 22.293a1 1 0 0 0 0 1.414 1 1 0 0 0 1.414 0L12 13.414l10.293 10.293a1 1 0 0 0 1.414 0 1 1 0 0 0 0-1.414L13.414 12 23.707 1.707a1 1 0 0 0 0-1.414Z" fill="#000000" opacity="1" data-original="#000000"/></g></svg>

                <img src="{{ block.settings.thumbnail_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.thumbnail_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
              {% else %}

              {% endif %}
            </div>

      <button class="shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">

            {% endif %}
            {% assign video_id = block.settings.video.id | default: block.settings.video_url.id %}
            {% assign loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id %}
            {%- if block.settings.video == null and block.settings.video_url != null -%}
            {%- if block.settings.video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
            <iframe
                data-src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                data-src2="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                data-src3="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=1&muted=1&controls=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                allowfullscreen
                class="lazy"
            ></iframe>
            {%- else -%}
            <iframe
                data-src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                data-src1="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                data-src2="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                data-src3="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=1&muted=1&controls=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                allowfullscreen
                class="lazy"
            ></iframe>
            {% endif %}
            {% else %}
              <video data-src="{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}" 
                {% if block.settings.thumbnail_image != blank %}
                  poster="{{ block.settings.thumbnail_image | image_url: '200x'  }}"
                {% endif %}
                muted 
                autoplay 
                playsinline 
                preload="none" 
                loop 
                class="lazy">
              </video>
            {% endif %}
            <div class="shoppable-play-button-{{ section.id }}">
              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" fill="#000000" version="1.1" id="Layer_1" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xml:space="preserve">
                <g>
                    <g>
                        <path d="M500.203,236.907L30.869,2.24c-6.613-3.285-14.443-2.944-20.736,0.939C3.84,7.083,0,13.931,0,21.333v469.333    c0,7.403,3.84,14.251,10.133,18.155c3.413,2.112,7.296,3.179,11.2,3.179c3.264,0,6.528-0.747,9.536-2.24l469.333-234.667    C507.435,271.467,512,264.085,512,256S507.435,240.533,500.203,236.907z"/>
                    </g>
                </g>
              </svg>
            </div>          
          </div>
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
    </div> 
    <div class="shoppable-sound-{{ section.id }} active">
      <svg class="shoppable-mute-{{ section.id }}" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path fill="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z"></path><path d="M5.889 16H2a1 1 0 0 1-1-1V9a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h3.889l5.294-4.332a.5.5 0 0 1 .817.387v15.89a.5.5 0 0 1-.817.387L5.89 16zm14.525-4l3.536 3.536-1.414 1.414L19 13.414l-3.536 3.536-1.414-1.414L17.586 12 14.05 8.464l1.414-1.414L19 10.586l3.536-3.536 1.414 1.414L20.414 12z"></path></svg>

                      <p class="shoppable-product-compare-price-{{ section.id }}">{{ product.compare_at_price | money }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>                          
                {% endif %}
                <p class="shoppable-product-form-stock-{{ section.id }} {% unless product.available %}out{% endunless %}">{% if product.available %}{{ product_stock }}{% else %}{{ product_out_stock }}{% endif %}</p> 
              </div>
              {% if use_selector and product.variants.size > 1 %}
                <div class="shoppable-product-select-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
                  <select class="shoppable-product-select-{{ section.id }}">
                    {%- for variant in product.variants -%}
                        <option data-price="{{ variant.price }}" data-stock="{{ variant.available }}" value="{{ variant.id }}">{{ variant.title }}</option>
                    {% endfor %}
                  </select>
                  <span>
                    <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" id="Layer_1" enable-background="new 0 0 100 100" height="512" viewBox="0 0 100 100" width="512"><g><path d="m67.41 45.41-2.82-2.82-14.59 14.58-14.59-14.58-2.82 2.82 17.41 17.42z"/></g></svg>  
                  </span>
                </div>
              {% endif %}
              <div class="shoppable-product-buy-content-{{ section.id }}">
                <div class="shoppable-product-quantity-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
                  <span class="shoppable-product-minus-{{ section.id }}">
                    <svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M2 9H16" stroke="black" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round"></path></svg>
                  </span>
                  <p class="shoppable-product-count-{{ section.id }}">1</p>
                  <span class="shoppable-product-plus-{{ section.id }}">
                    <svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M8.25 16C8.25 16.4142 8.58579 16.75 9 16.75C9.41421 16.75 9.75 16.4142 9.75 16V9.75H16C16.4142 9.75 16.75 9.41421 16.75 9C16.75 8.58579 16.4142 8.25 16 8.25H9.75V2C9.75 1.58579 9.41421 1.25 9 1.25C8.58579 1.25 8.25 1.58579 8.25 2V8.25H2C1.58579 8.25 1.25 8.58579 1.25 9C1.25 9.41421 1.58579 9.75 2 9.75H8.25V16Z" fill="black"></path></svg>
                  </span>
                </div>
                <div class="shoppable-product-form-button-content-{{ section.id }}">
                  {%- form 'product',  product, class: 'form', novalidate: 'novalidate', data-type: 'add-to-cart-form' -%}
                    <input type="hidden" name="id" value="{{ product.selected_or_first_available_variant.id }}" disabled class="product-variant-id">
                    <input type="hidden" value="{{ product.selected_or_first_available_variant.id }}" name="items[0][id]" class="product-other-variant-id">
                    <input class="quantity-input-{{ section.id }}" type="hidden" name="items[0][quantity]" value="1">
                    <button
                      id="ProductSubmitButton-{{ section.id }}"
                      type="submit"
                      name="add"
                      class="shoppable-product-form-button-{{ section.id }}"
                      {% if product.selected_or_first_available_variant.available == false %}
                        disabled
                      {% endif %}
                    >
                      <svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M1.5 1.125C1.08579 1.125 0.75 1.46079 0.75 1.875C0.75 2.28921 1.08579 2.625 1.5 2.625H3.15337L5.26921 11.7936C5.34774 12.1339 5.65076 12.375 6 12.375H14.25C14.5869 12.375 14.8825 12.1503 14.9726 11.8257L16.8476 5.07573C16.9104 4.84991 16.8639 4.60775 16.7221 4.42116C16.5803 4.23456 16.3594 4.125 16.125 4.125H5.03894L4.48079 1.70636C4.40226 1.36606 4.09924 1.125 3.75 1.125H1.5ZM6.59663 10.875L5.3851 5.625H15.1383L13.6799 10.875H6.59663ZM7.5 16.5C8.32843 16.5 9 15.8284 9 15C9 14.1716 8.32843 13.5 7.5 13.5C6.67157 13.5 6 14.1716 6 15C6 15.8284 6.67157 16.5 7.5 16.5ZM12.75 16.5C13.5784 16.5 14.25 15.8284 14.25 15C14.25 14.1716 13.5784 13.5 12.75 13.5C11.9216 13.5 11.25 14.1716 11.25 15C11.25 15.8284 11.9216 16.5 12.75 16.5Z" fill="#FFFFFF"></path></svg>
                      <span>
                        {%- if product.selected_or_first_available_variant.available == false -%}
                          {{ button_sold }}
                        {%- else -%}
                          {{ button_add }}
                        {%- endif -%}
                      </span>
                    </button>
                  {%- endform -%}             
                </div>
              </div>
              
            </div>             
        </div>
      {% endfor %}       
    </div>
  {% endfor %}  
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-lazyload@19.1.3/dist/lazyload.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>


<script>
  var formayMoneyForBuyItWith = function(cents, format) {
    if (typeof cents == 'string') { cents = cents.replace('.',''); }
    var value = '';
    var placeholderRegex = /\{\{\s*(\w+)\s*\}\}/;
    var formatString = (format || this.money_format);
  
    function defaultOption(opt, def) {
       return (typeof opt == 'undefined' ? def : opt);
    }
  
    function formatWithDelimiters(number, precision, thousands, decimal) {
      precision = defaultOption(precision, 2);
      thousands = defaultOption(thousands, ',');
      decimal   = defaultOption(decimal, '.');
  
      if (isNaN(number) || number == null) { return 0; }
  
      number = (number/100.0).toFixed(precision);
  
      var parts   = number.split('.'),
          dollars = parts[0].replace(/(\d)(?=(\d\d\d)+(?!\d))/g, '$1' + thousands),
          cents   = parts[1] ? (decimal + parts[1]) : '';
  
      return dollars + cents;
    }
  
    switch(formatString.match(placeholderRegex)[1]) {
      case 'amount':
        value = formatWithDelimiters(cents, 2);
        break;
      case 'amount_no_decimals':
        value = formatWithDelimiters(cents, 0);
        break;
      case 'amount_with_comma_separator':
        value = formatWithDelimiters(cents, 2, '.', ',');
        break;
      case 'amount_no_decimals_with_comma_separator':
        value = formatWithDelimiters(cents, 0, '.', ',');
        break;
    }
  
    return formatString.replace(placeholderRegex, value);
  };
  
  function initShoppableProductVideos() {
    setTimeout(() => {
      let lazyLoadInstance = new LazyLoad();

      window.addEventListener(
        "LazyLoad::Initialized",
        function (event) {
          window.lazyLoadInstance = event.detail.instance;
        },
        false        
      ); 

      const slider = new Swiper(".shoppable-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
        speed: 800,
        breakpoints: {
          320: {
            spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
            slidesPerView: {{ slider_view_mobile }},
          },
          768: {
            spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
            slidesPerView: {{ slider_view | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }},
          },
          1024: {
            spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap }},
            slidesPerView: {{ slider_view }},
          }
        }
      });
      
      const thumbSlider = new Swiper(".shoppable-modal-thumbnail-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
        spaceBetween: 10,
        slidesPerView: 3,
        direction: 'vertical',
        freeMode: true,
        watchSlidesProgress: true,
        navigation: {
          nextEl: '.shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
          prevEl: '.shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
        },
      })

      const productLists = document.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-modal-products-{{ section.id }}');
      let toggles = document.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-video-{{ section.id }}');
      let modal = document.querySelector('.shoppable-modal-{{ section.id }}');
      let closeModal = document.querySelector('.shoppable-close-modal-{{ section.id }}');
      const soundBtn = document.querySelector('.shoppable-sound-{{ section.id }}');
      let activeSlideIndex = 0;

      if(productLists) {
        productLists.forEach(el => {
          let close = el.querySelector('.shoppable-modal-products-back-{{ section.id }}');
          if(close) {
            close.addEventListener('click', () => {
              let allVideos = document.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-modal-slide-{{ section.id }}');
              if(allVideos){
                allVideos.forEach(element => {
                  if(el.getAttribute('data-id') == element.id) {
                    let video = element.querySelector('video');
                    let frame = element.querySelector('iframe');
                    let src;
                    let src1;
                    let src2;
                    let src3;
                    if(frame) {
                      src1 = frame.getAttribute('data-src1');
                      src2 = frame.getAttribute('data-src2');
                      src3 = frame.getAttribute('data-src3');
                    }
                    
                    if(video) {
                      video.play();
                    }
                    if(frame) {
                      if(soundBtn.classList.contains('active')) {
                        frame.src = src1; 
                      } else {
                        frame.src = src3; 
                      }
                    }
                    element.classList.remove('pause');
                  }
                })
              }
              el.classList.remove('mobile-active');
            })
          }
        })
      }

      const sliderModal = new Swiper(".shoppable-modal-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
        speed: 800,
        spaceBetween: 10,
        slidesPerView: 1,
        direction: 'vertical',
        keyboard: {
          enabled: true,
        },
        thumbs: {
          swiper: thumbSlider,
        },
        navigation: {
          nextEl: '.shoppable-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
          prevEl: '.shoppable-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
        },
        on: {
          slideChange: function () {
            const slides = this.slides;
      
            for (let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
              let video = slides[i].querySelector('video');
              let frame = slides[i].querySelector('iframe');
              let src;
              let src1;
              let src2;
              let src3;
              if(frame) {
                src1 = frame.getAttribute('data-src1');
                src2 = frame.getAttribute('data-src2');
                src3 = frame.getAttribute('data-src3');
              }
      
              if (i === this.activeIndex) {
                if (video) {
                  if(soundBtn.classList.contains('active')) {
                    soundBtn.classList.remove('active');
                  }
                  video.muted = true;
                  setTimeout(() => {
                    video.play();
                  }, 300);
                }

                if(frame) {
                  if(soundBtn.classList.contains('active')) {
                    soundBtn.classList.remove('active');
                  }
                  frame.src = src3; 
                }

                const id = slides[i].id;
                if(productLists) {
                  productLists.forEach(el => {
                    const products = el.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-modal-product-{{ section.id }}');                    
                    if(id == el.getAttribute('data-id') && products.length > 0) {
                      el.classList.add('active');                      
                    } else {
                      el.classList.remove('active');    
                    }
                  })
                }

                slides[i].classList.remove('pause');

              } else {
                if (video) {
                  video.pause();
                }

                if(frame) {
                  frame.src = src2;
                }
              }              
            }
          },
        },
      });

      const sliderImages = new Swiper(".shoppable-product-form-images-{{ section.id }}", {
        speed: 800,
        spaceBetween: 10,
        slidesPerView: 1.5,
      })

      function stopAllVideos() {        
        const allVideos = document.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-modal-slide-{{ section.id }} video');
        const allIframes = document.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-modal-slide-{{ section.id }} iframe');

        allVideos.forEach(video => {
          video.pause();
          video.currentTime = 0;
          console.log('Stop video')
        });

        allIframes.forEach(iframe => {
          iframe.src = iframe.getAttribute('data-src2');
        });
      }

      function updateActiveProduct(activeSlideId) {
        const products = document.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-products-list-{{ section.id }} [data-id]');
        
        products.forEach(product => {
          if (product.getAttribute('data-id') === activeSlideId) {
            product.classList.add('active');
          } else {
            product.classList.remove('active');
          }
        });
      }

      stopAllVideos();

      if (toggles) {        
        toggles.forEach((item, index) => {
          item.addEventListener('click', (e) => {               
            sliderModal.slideTo(index);            
            sliderModal.slides.forEach(slide => {
              if(slide.classList.contains('swiper-slide-active')) {                
                const video = slide.querySelector('video');
                const frame = slide.querySelector('iframe');
                let src1, src2;
                if(frame) {
                  src1 = frame.getAttribute('data-src1');
                  src2 = frame.getAttribute('data-src2');
                }

                const id = slide.id;
                if(productLists) {
                  productLists.forEach(el => {
                    const products = el.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-modal-product-{{ section.id }}');                    
                    if(id == el.getAttribute('data-id') && products.length > 0) {
                      el.classList.add('active');                      
                    } else {
                      el.classList.remove('active');    
                    }
                  })
                }

                setTimeout(() => {
                  document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
                  modal.classList.add('active');

                  if (video) {
                    video.play();
                    video.muted = false;
                  }

                  if(frame) {
                    frame.src = src1;
                  }
                }, 200);   
              }
            });

           if (soundBtn) {
             soundBtn.classList.add('active');
           }
          });
        });
      }

      if (closeModal) {
        closeModal.addEventListener('click', () => {
          document.body.style.overflow = '';
          modal.classList.remove('active');
          stopAllVideos();
        });
      }

      if (soundBtn) {
        soundBtn.addEventListener('click', (event) => {
          event.stopPropagation();
          soundBtn.classList.toggle('active');

          let videos = document.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-modal-slide-{{ section.id }} video');
          if(videos) {
            videos.forEach(video => {
              if (!soundBtn.classList.contains('active')) {
                video.muted = true;
              } else {
                video.muted = false;
              }          
            });
          }   
          
          let iframes = document.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-modal-slide-{{ section.id }} iframe');
          if(iframes) {
            iframes.forEach(iframe => {
              if (!soundBtn.classList.contains('active')) {
                const src3 = iframe.getAttribute('data-src3');
                iframe.src = src3;
              } else {
                const src = iframe.getAttribute('data-src1');
                iframe.src = src;
              }             
            });
          }  
        });
      }   

      const products = document.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-modal-product-{{ section.id }}');
      const forms = document.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-product-form-body-{{ section.id }}');
      const goBack = document.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-product-back-{{ section.id }}');

      let buyForms = document.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-product-buy-content-{{ section.id }}');

      if(buyForms) {
        buyForms.forEach(el => {
          const minus = el.querySelector('.shoppable-product-minus-{{ section.id }}');
          const plus = el.querySelector('.shoppable-product-plus-{{ section.id }}');
          const count = el.querySelector('.shoppable-product-count-{{ section.id }}');
          const quantityInput = el.querySelector('.quantity-input-{{ section.id }}');
    
          if(minus) {
            minus.addEventListener('click', () => {
              if(Number(count.innerText) > 1) {
                count.innerText = Number(count.innerText) - 1;
              }
    
              quantityInput.value = Number(count.innerText) - 1;
            })
          }
    
          if(plus) {
            plus.addEventListener('click', () => {
              if(Number(count.innerText) < 10) {
                count.innerText = Number(count.innerText) + 1;
              }
    
              quantityInput.value = Number(count.innerText) + 1;
            })
          }   
        })
      }
      
      if(products) {
        products.forEach(el => {
          el.addEventListener('click', () => {
            if(forms) {
              forms.forEach(form => {
                if(el.id == form.getAttribute('data-id')) {
                  form.classList.add('active');
                } else {
                  form.classList.remove('active');
                }
              })
            }
          })
        })
      }

      if(goBack) {
        goBack.forEach(back => {
          back.addEventListener('click', () => {
            forms.forEach(form => {
              form.classList.remove('active');            
            })
          })
        })        
      }
      
      let allVideos = document.querySelectorAll('.shoppable-modal-slide-{{ section.id }}');
      
      if(allVideos) {
        allVideos.forEach(el => {
          const video = el.querySelector("video");
          const iframe = el.querySelector("iframe");
          let toggle = el.querySelector('.shoppable-modal-slide-toggle-{{ section.id }}');
          el.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
            if (video) {
              if(el.classList.contains('pause')) {
                video.play();
              } else {
                video.pause();
              }
            }
            if (iframe) {
              const src2 = iframe.getAttribute('data-src2');
              const src1 = iframe.getAttribute('data-src1');
              if(el.classList.contains('pause')) {
                iframe.src = src1;
              } else {
                iframe.src = src2;
              }
            }
            el.classList.toggle('pause'); 
          });

          if(toggle) {
            toggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
              productLists.forEach(element => {
                if(element.getAttribute('data-id') == toggle.id) {
                  element.classList.add('mobile-active');
                }
              })
            });
          }
        })
      } 

      document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        if (e.target == modal) {
          document.body.style.overflow = '';
          modal.classList.remove('active');
          let frames = modal.querySelectorAll('iframe');
          let videos = modal.querySelectorAll('video');
          if(frames){
            frames.forEach(el => {
              let src1 = el.getAttribute('data-src');
              el.src = src1;              
            });
          }
          if(videos){
            videos.forEach(el => {
              el.pause();
            });
          }
        }
      });
     

      sliderModal.on('slideChange', () => {
        activeSlideIndex = sliderModal.realIndex;
      });

      if(forms) {
        forms.forEach(el => {
          let selector = el.querySelector('.shoppable-product-select-{{ section.id }}');
          let price = el.querySelector('.shoppable-product-form-price-{{ section.id }}');
          let stock = el.querySelector('.shoppable-product-form-stock-{{ section.id }}');
          let submit = el.querySelector('.shoppable-product-form-button-{{ section.id }}');
          let form = el.querySelector('form');

          if(selector) {
            let productInitialTtitle = el.getAttribute('data-title');
            selector.addEventListener('change', () => {
              let id = selector.value;
              let newPrice = selector.selectedOptions[0].getAttribute('data-price');
              let newStock = selector.selectedOptions[0].getAttribute('data-stock');
              

              if(price) {
                price.innerText = formayMoneyForBuyItWith(newPrice, "{{ shop.money_format }}");
              }

              if(stock) {
                if(newStock == "true") {
                  stock.classList.remove('out');
                  stock.innerText = "{{ product_stock }}";
                  if(submit) {
                    submit.removeAttribute('disabled');
                  }
                } else {
                  stock.classList.add('out');
                  stock.innerText = "{{ product_out_stock }}";
                  if(submit) {
                    submit.setAttribute('disabled', true);
                  }
                }
              }
              
              if(form) {
                let input = form.querySelector('input[name="id"]');
                let input2 = form.querySelector('input[name="items[0][id]"]');
                if(input) {
                  input.value = id;
                }
                if(input2) {
                  input2.value = id;
                }
              }
            });
  
          }
        })
      }
      
    }, 400)
  }
  
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initShoppableProductVideos);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initShoppableProductVideos);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initShoppableProductVideos);
  }
</script>

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
